articles.title: BRICS Summit Begins Today, Buzz Over Possible PM Modi-Xi Jinping Meet - NDTV
articles.description: As Prime Minister Narendra Modi left for South Africa to attend the BRICS Summit, sources say there is a possibility of a bilateral meeting with Chinese President Xi Jinping.
articles.content: <li>The Prime Minister will join the leaders of Brazil, China, Russia and South Africa in Johannesburg. This will be the first in-person BRICS summit after 2019. Over the last three years, meetings w… [+2490 chars]
